meanings.definition: Unsolicited messages sent over instant messaging platforms.
meanings.sent1: I received a lot of annoying spim on my messaging app.
meanings.sent2: The spim flooded my inbox and made it hard to find important messages.
meanings.sent3: The spim messages were like pesky flies buzzing around my screen.
meanings.sent4: The spim was a digital invasion of privacy, like uninvited guests in my virtual space.
meanings.sent5: The spim was like a never-ending stream of junk mail, cluttering up my chat window.

meanings.definition: To send unsolicited messages over instant messaging platforms.
meanings.sent1: I accidentally spimmed my friend with a chain message.
meanings.sent2: Some people spim others with advertisements for products.
meanings.sent3: I didn't mean to spim you with all those messages, it was a mistake.
meanings.sent4: He spimmed the group chat with so many messages, it was overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: She spimmed the chat room with so much spam, it was like a digital storm.
